scripts.gh-pages: rsync --exclude .git -a present/ gh-pages/ && cd gh-pages && git add -A && git diff --quiet --exit-code --cached || git commit -m 'Update gh-pages.' && git push
scripts.gh-pages-init: rm -rf gh-pages && git clone `git remote -v | head -n 1 | awk '{print $2}'` gh-pages && cd gh-pages && git checkout -b gh-pages
